code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./Testimonial.css';import leftArrow from'../../assets/leftArrow.png';import rightArrow from'../../assets/rightArrow.png';import{testimonialsData}from'../../data/testimonialsData';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Testimonial=()=>{const transition={type:'spring',duration:3};const[selected,setselected]=useState(0);const tlength=testimonialsData.length;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Testimonials",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"left-t",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Testimonials"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"stroke-text",children:"What they"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"say about us"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.span,{initial:{opacity:0,x:100},animate:{opacity:1,x:0},exit:{opacity:0,x:-100},transition:transition,children:testimonialsData[selected].review},selected),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{color:'var(--orange)'},children:testimonialsData[selected].name}),"  ","-",testimonialsData[selected].status]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"right-t",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.div,{initial:{opacity:0,x:-100},transition:{...transition,duration:2},whileInView:{opacity:1,x:0}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.div,{initial:{opacity:0,x:100},transition:{...transition,duration:2},whileInView:{opacity:1,x:0}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.img,{initial:{opacity:0,x:100},animate:{opacity:1,x:0},exit:{opacity:0,x:-100},transition:transition,src:testimonialsData[selected].image,alt:""},selected),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"arrows",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{onClick:()=>{selected===0?setselected(tlength-1):setselected(prev=>prev-1);},src:leftArrow,alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{onClick:()=>{selected===tlength-1?setselected(0):setselected(prev=>prev+1);},src:rightArrow,alt:""})]})]})]});};export default Testimonial;
